fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit a player to plant a bomb on them and their visitors.
- At any time (day, night, or even transition between them), detonate your bombs. Instantly kill all players with bombs.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- People who visit you or your target will have a bomb planted on them.
- People who you vote will have a bomb planted on them. Unvoting them will not remove the bomb, but placing a vote on someone else will.
- People who vote you will have a bomb planted on them. This is removed if they unvote you.
- A bomb can only be removed if the criteria to remove it is met in the same phase it was placed. After that, it is permanent.
- Townies do not know if a bomb was placed on them. Non-Town roles will, but only at the end of the night, even if it was placed at day.
- If you detonate during the day, the majority needed to hang someone will update accordingly.
- You know who has a bomb.
